title: I.D.
description: Nobody knows who the WATCHERS are. But they are around us. They observe us. They see the things we can't see....Who is Eve Hardy? Is she the only child of a normal pair of parents? Or is she the offspring of a bizarre experiment that has gone horribly wrong? Eve doesn't know. But if she doesn't find out the truth, it will destroy her. Time is running out....
author: Peter Lerangis
